projects-page.title: Projects
projects-page.description: Over the years, I have had the opportunity to work on a variety of projects, ranging from showcase websites to e-commerce platforms. My goal has always been to design seamless, high-performance user experiences tailored to the specific needs of each client. Whether it‚Äôs highlighting a business through a showcase website or developing an optimized online store, each project reflects my passion for web design and technical performance.

about-page.title: FullStack Web Developer
about-page.description: Having built my expertise in digital communication and web marketing for over 5 years, I felt the need to take on a new challenge: web development. Why? Combining these two fields with the ingenuity of coding allows me to design websites that go beyond mere functionality while offering the best possible user experience. When I'm not fixing bugs, I capture moments of happiness as a

cinephoria-page.title: Cin√©phoria
cinephoria-page.intro: Cin√©phoria is a web application for booking cinema tickets. It allows users to view currently showing films, cinema sessions, available theaters, and seats.
cinephoria-page.disclaimer: Disclaimer: This project was realized in the context of a school project. The company does not exist really.
cinephoria-page.description-1: Cin√©phoria is a gem of French cinema, a true icon of cinematic entertainment. For this project, I created the logo and visual identity of Cin√©phoria. The logo consists of a stylized film reel, symbolizing the film industry. The visual identity is simple and clean, to highlight the films and cinema sessions.
cinephoria-page.description-2: Having the choice of technologies, I opted for the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js) + MySQL and Prisma. Reservations, reviews, and incidents are managed in NoSQL with MongoDB, while users, sessions, films, cinemas, theaters, and seats are managed in SQL with MySQL and Prisma.

alpha-sante-page.title: Alpha Sant√©
alpha-sante-page.intro: Alpha Sant√© is an online store born from the need to contribute to well-being that stems from vitality, through natural, simple, and accessible means for everyone.
alpha-sante-page.description-1: For this project, I created the logo and visual identity of Alpha Sant√©. The logo consists of a stylized laurel leaf, symbolizing victory and wisdom. The green color is associated with nature, health, and growth. The visual identity is simple and clean, highlighting natural products and dietary supplements.
alpha-sante-page.description-2: The client wanted a simple and easy-to-maintain online store. I developed the site with WordPress and WooCommerce, using Elementor to simplify content management.
alpha-sante-page.description-3: To highlight my client's products and ensure consistency, I took product photos using my own equipment.

jimagine-hier-page.title: J'imagine Hier
jimagine-hier-page.intro: This project is particularly close to my heart. In 2020, I co-founded the company J'imagine Hier. It was a real challenge and a lot of learning to build the company's digital ecosystem from A to Z: brand identity, website, photos, social media, etc. This project concluded in 2022.
jimagine-hier-page.disclaimer: Disclaimer: The company does not exist anymore. It is not still possible to create an account or purchase products.
jimagine-hier-page.description-1: For this project, I created the brand identity for J'imagine Hier. The chosen colors were green and white, symbolizing nature and purity.
jimagine-hier-page.description-2: I developed the J'imagine Hier website using WordPress and WooCommerce. I also used Elementor and WP-Bakery to simplify content management.
jimagine-hier-page.description-3: I took all the photos at home by improvising a photo studio. To ensure high-quality images, I used various FujiFilm cameras, which I still use for weddings.

jeremydan-page.title: Jeremy Dan
jeremydan-page.intro: Jeremy Dan is my wedding photographer. It allows me to present my work, my services, and to share happy moments with my clients. I aim to evolve the site by offering a private gallery for married couples with a secure access. I will use PostgreSQL to store photos and wedding data.
jeremydan-page.description-1: For this project, I created the logo and visual identity of Jeremy Dan. The logo is a simplified caricature of my face. The visual identity is simple and clean, highlighting wedding photos.
jeremydan-page.description-2: I developed the site with Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. I also used Vercel to deploy the site.
jeremydan-page.description-3: Of course, all the photos on the site have been taken by me. Have a look at my wedding clich√©s!
